markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs=""
>
[Whip of Compliance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=593)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held, 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The handle of this braided leather _+1 striking [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ is made from the hairs of a variety of rare and mythical animals. When used against an animal, the _whip of compliance_ can potentially force the target to follow your commands.

<document level="2" id="action-376" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Whip of Compliance
